glm::min
GLM_FUNC_DECL C< T > min(C< T > const &x, C< T > const &y, C< T > const &z, C< T > const &w)
Return the minimum component-wise values of 4 inputs.
glm::max
GLM_FUNC_DECL C< T > max(C< T > const &x, C< T > const &y, C< T > const &z, C< T > const &w)
